sentences.english: From the stereographic plots of the slip line directions measured around the specimen surface, the slip planes were determined.
sentences.chinese: 根据试样表面滑移线的方向，在极图上确定滑移面。

sentences.english: Used to weight the flax fiber or flax caudex sample.
sentences.chinese: 用于定量称重亚麻的纤维或麻茎试样。

sentences.english: Figure 2 Anodic polarization curves of chrome steel samples in simulative mineral slurry.
sentences.chinese: 图2铬钢试样在模拟铜矿浆中的阳极极化曲线。

sentences.english: The liquid-phase sample injection valve ensured the sampling reproducibility.
sentences.chinese: 使用液相进样阀液态直接进样保证了试样的代表性。

sentences.english: Bending test specified values apply to horizontal samples.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲试验规定值适用于横向试样。

sentences.english: The theoretical result is generally higher than the experimental result, due to unevenness of nonwoven geotextile and other reasons.
sentences.chinese: 由于试样的不均匀性等原因，理论值一般高于试验值。

sentences.english: Simulated galvanic cell tests and stress corrosion tests using pre-creeping specimens were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 进行了模拟原电池试验和预蠕变试样的应力腐蚀试验。

sentences.english: Actuating properties of samples were measured and the influence factors were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 测试了试样的驱动性能并讨论了影响因素。

sentences.english: The wastewater samples is transmitted by an air - operated aspirator to the liquid injection valve.
sentences.chinese: 用气动吸引器将废水试样送入液体注射阀。

sentences.english: The 3PB (three points bending) specimens were used to study the fatigue fracture behavior of these weldments.
sentences.chinese: 用三点弯曲试样对这些焊接结构的疲劳特性进行研究。

sentences.english: Moreover, the wear of deposited metal samples increases with load increasing.
sentences.chinese: 负荷增大，熔敷金属试样的磨损也呈增加趋势。

sentences.english: The results show that the wear resistance changes with the variety of shapes and distributing distance of the non-smooth unit.
sentences.chinese: 非光滑试样的耐磨性随单元体分布间隔的减小而提高。

sentences.english: The levitation position of the ferromagnetism material was calculated according to the magnetization force.
sentences.chinese: 根据铁磁性材料所受的磁化力计算了试样的悬浮位置。

sentences.english: Introduce a method of analyzing ferro-alloy test piece by fluorescent X-ray.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了X射线荧光分析铁合金试样的制备方法。

sentences.english: Secondly, it is introduced that a new applied standard metal mold tension test specimen is designed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新的实用标准金属型抗拉试样。

sentences.english: Table 1 Chemical composition of chrome steel samples.

definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
blank (for a coin etc)/breed or strain
